title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: The LCD of  1 ,  5 over y, , and , fraction, 6 over, y squared,   is  y squared .

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$y^2-5y=-6$$
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  y squared minus 5 y is equal to negative 6
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get   y squared minus 5 y is equal to negative 6

title: Solve The Equation
text: $$y^2-5y+6=0$$ becomes $$(y-3)(y-2)$$. Our solutions are thus $$y=3$$ and $$y=2$$.
speech: y squared minus 5 y plus 6 is equal to 0  becomes  parentheses y minus 3,  times, parentheses y minus 2,  . Our solutions are thus  y is equal to 3  and  y, is equal to 2 .

becomes    y minus 3,  times,  y minus 2,
